title: To-Do App with Google Auth
desc: A modern and responsive To-Do List application built with React and Firebase. Features include Google Sign-In, real-time task management, and PWA support for mobile use.

title: IoT Smart Light Management
desc: A web-based IoT platform to control and monitor smart lighting systems using ESP32, Express.JS and MySQL. Includes real-time status updates, scheduling, and secure access.

title: Smart Door Control
desc: A web-based IoT platform to control and monitor door systems using ESP32, Express, React Js, Firebase. Includes real-time status updates, and secure access.
